info.title: Facebook Backend Clone
info.description: An api study like Facebook requirements

title.description: This is a short human-readable error message.
title.example: User not found with given information(s).

detail.description: This is a detailed information of the error for developers. Most error messages is not included this property.
detail.example: Mongoose error Cast to ObjectId failed for value abc1234 at path _id

media.description: Array of media URLs of the Post

comments.description: Array of IDs of the comments in the post

commentCount.description: Number of comments on the post

likes.description: Array of IDs of users liked this post

likeCount.description: Number of likes on the post

userId.description: MongoDB document ID of the owner of this post

likes.description: Array of IDs of users liked this comment

likeCount.description: Number of likes on the comments

userId.description: MongoDB document ID of the owner of this comment

authParam.name: Authorization
authParam.description: Pass the access_token which you get after signed in

requestBody.description: User to register. All the specified places in the example are required to register.

example.message: Signed Up Succesfully. Please activate your account.

400.description: This route may return multiple error with 400 status. See the response title and detail if the response code is 400.

duplicate_key.description: This error means email is already in use.

post.description: You need to activate account after register. Normally activation mail is sent automatically after register. But, mailing may be required again.

requestBody.description: Post the email which you want to send mail again.

get.description: Activate an account using activation token which is sent to Mail adress.

parameters.name: accountActivationToken
parameters.description: This will be sent to registered mail adress.

post.description: Send the access_token to the backend to logout.
This route sends a Password Reset mail to given adress.

put.description: This route is used to reset password after forgot-password request. Pass the resetPasswordToken in query params. Dynamic url will be sent in Password Reset mail.

requestBody.description: logoutEverywhere value reference that if user wants to logout all sessions or not.

put.description: This route is used to edit password.

requestBody.description: logoutEverywhere value reference that if user wants to logout all sessions or not.

put.description: Requesting this routes sends a 6 digit confirmation code to given new mail adress. That code must be used in next route.

requestBody.description: Needs new email adress and password.

put.description: This route is used to change email adress.

requestBody.description: Needs new email adress and password.

200.description: It means you get an user object
It means you get an user object

404.description: User not found with the given userId

get.description: Search a user by name and lastname

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: keyword you want to search by (case-insensitive).

200.description: If you see 200 status code, it means user is found.

404.description: If you see 404 status code, it means user is not found.

get.description: Send a friend request to a user. There are multiple error with same code in this route.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user to whom the request is to be sent

404.description: If you see 404 status code, it means user was not found.
If you see 404 status code, it means user was not found.

400.description: This means there is no friend request from this user.

404.description: If you see 404 status code, it means user was not found.

400.description: You haven't sent request to this user or user accepted your request

404.description: If you see 404 status code, it means user was not found.

400.description: There is no friend request from this user.

404.description: If you see 404 status code, it means user was not found.

get.description: This route returns basic user information like name, lastname, photoUrl and friend request to use at navbar/sidebar.

200.description: Returns an user object with the success message.
Returns paginated user posts with a success message
Returns paginated user feed with a success message

put.description: Update profile information. Notice that only the specified fields in the example are allowed to update by this route. Other properties which is related with security (email, password etc.) must be changed by /auth/** routes.
